content: I completely agree with you. Technology should be seen as a tool to help enhance our lives and make things easier, rather than something that controls us. It’s essential to use technology in a responsible way that benefits humans and the planet. We must work towards a more sustainable and equitable future, where everyone can benefit from technological advancements. By being mindful of the consequences of new technology and working collaboratively towards solutions, we can pave the way for a brighter, more equitable future.
